headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' https://cdn.jsdelivr.net https://w.soundcloud.com https://www.gstatic.com; connect-src 'self' https://firestore.googleapis.com https://identitytoolkit.googleapis.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' data:; frame-src https://w.soundcloud.com;
